thread.title: Tony Rigby

author: Tony Rigby
title: Tony Rigby
text:
A really professional company with impecable customer service. Delivery was prompt. Food quality and packaging was first class.
Sadly my dog didnt get on with the food though so cancelled future deliveries which was an easy and pain free process. Would recommend this company to anyone.
We received 18 days worth of food free. My only concern would be that they should offer a small sample pack free instead say 48 hours worth instead. We have given the rest of his food to a dog rescue center so that it wasnt wasted.
